name: StrikeDistance
tagline: Calculator that determines the distance between you and a lightning strike
body:
# Details
## Status
* Windows: in development
* Windows Phone: 1.3.0.4 available, 2.0.0.0 on hold (see problems section)
* Android (phone and tablet): in development
* Android (Wear): on hold (see problems section)
* Android (Glass): planned
* iOS (phone): in development
* iOS (tablet): planned

## Problems
* Windows Phone: a bug in the .NET Framework is preventing a core feature from working properly
* Android (Wear): unstable development environment

***

# Download
* Windows Phone: [Windows Phone Store page](https://www.windowsphone.com/en-us/store/app/strikedistance/d54883ad-dcce-4771-a5cf-882a7a4e9a4f) | [Version 1.3.0.4 source code](greg.whatleycomputerservices.com/sourcecode/strikedistance-1.3.0.4.zip)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
